common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this api to fetch the logistics information of a booking these info can be used for airwaybill printing. Dedicated for crossborder SLS order airwaybill. May not be applicable for local channel airwaybill. Besides, this api supports returning personal info as images.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Can not get airway bill for warehouse booking orders.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Can not arrange shipment for warehouse booking orders

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for a booking.

","name":"booking_sn","sample":"201201E81SYYKE","type":"string","required":"True","key":"nQWbryQ"},{"description":"

recipient address to query as image

","name":"recipient_address_info","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"False","key":"yQbyjSw","children":[{"description":"

fields to query in the recipient address, should be name, phone, full_address, town, district, city, state, region, zipcode.

","name":"key","sample":"name","type":"string","required":"True","key":"EfjXHZz"},{"description":"

image style

","name":"style","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"FYjKDBJ","children":[{"description":"

supports bold and italic

","name":"text_style","sample":"[\"bold\", \"italic\"]","type":"string[]","required":"False","key":"zhJJRFe"},{"description":"

supports 1 - 108

","name":"font_size","sample":"12","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"eJsenew"},{"description":"

color string like \"#AbCd12\"

","name":"text_color","sample":"#39c5bb","type":"string","required":"False","key":"jYJycyf"},{"description":"

supports 0.1-30, in centimeters

","name":"image_width","sample":"3.0","type":"float","required":"False","key":"wbpCYJr"},{"description":"

text horizontal align, supports left, center and right.

","name":"h_align","sample":"center","type":"string","required":"False","key":"yZwcrmK"}]}]}],"response_params":[{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"862fc4d77de74edf9bf045c7650f1988","type":"string","required":null,"key":"QPRAzb"},{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"error_auth","type":"string","required":null,"key":"PYXYJJJ"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Invalid access_token.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"YtxYyfy"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"WsfKbQx","children":[{"description":"","name":"recipient_address_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"CrQHQmZ","children":[{"description":"

queried field in recipient address

base64 encoded png data string

","name":"image","sample":"data:image/png;base64,/9j/4AAQSkZJRgABAgEASABIAAD/……","type":"string","required":null,"key":"CBfmmZn"}]},{"description":"","name":"shipping_document_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"FRQGFsR","children":[{"description":"

Use this field to indicate booking weight when calculate the shipping fee. The unit of weigh is gram.

","name":"booking_weight","sample":"500","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"rcmrzBs"},{"description":"
